title: Summer 2018: The Best Celebrity Vacation Spots

meta_data.description: If you think your summer weekends at the shore are #fomo-inducing, check out where your favorite stars are spending their sun-filled days (weeks, even months) off at these classic — at times unexpected — celebrity vacation spots.

og.title: Summer 2018: The Best Celebrity Vacation Spots | Jetsetter
og.description: If you think your summer weekends at the shore are #fomo-inducing, check out this season's hottest celebrity vacation spots, where your favorite stars are spending their sun-filled days (weeks, even months) off.
